column4: I was wondering if anybody could explain why playing xvid videos uses 100% of my CPU usage in Linux, please?
what player are you using, and what version of ubuntu
ok, do you have the 3d desktop effects enabled ?
what processor and video card you using?
Intel Celeron Mobile (laptop) 1.6Ghz x86, Video is ATI Xpress Radeon 200M
that's why it's using 100% ... underpowered video card
try turning the 3d desktop effects off
it gets choppy on my desktop... athlon-64 3500 with a geforce 6600LE
i play WoW on linux... disabling the 3d effects doubled my framerate
ok, going to give it a try and report back
remember, if it looks flashy, or even touches 3d, it's probably gonna kill CPU
